ru.cos.cs.agents.framework.asynch
Class AsynchSimulationEngine<SE extends SimulationEngine>

java.lang.Object
  ru.cos.cs.agents.framework.asynch.AsynchSimulationEngine<SE>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleAsynchSE, TrafficAsynchSimulationEngine
public abstract class AsynchSimulationEngine<SE extends SimulationEngine>
extends Object
implements Runnable

Asynchronous version of simulation engine.

Asynchronous means that simulation process will run in a separate thread and therefore application program thread will not be affected(at least explicitly) by performance of simulation process.
It is very useful for application programs with GUI that will never hangs up while simulation step is calculated. Asynchronous Simulation Engine implements behavior of simulation simulation and provides its all synchronization functionality to prevent "race conditions".

Communication between application program and simulation engine is implemented by asynchronous sending and receiving messages.

Author:
zroslaw

processIncomingMessage

protected abstract void processIncomingMessage(Message message)

stopSimulation

public final void stopSimulation()
Stop simulation process. Simulation engine thread will finish current and last step and stop. Simulation thread will be stopped.

pauseSimulation

public final void pauseSimulation()
Pause simulation engine. Simulation engine thread will finish current step and suspend. Simulation thread will be alive.

setTimeWrapFactor

public final void setTimeWrapFactor(float timeWrapFactor)
Set time wrap factor.

Parameters:
timeWrapFactor - time wrap factor

resumeSimulation

public void resumeSimulation()
Resume simulation after it was paused by pauseSimulation() invocation.

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(Message message)
Send message to simulation engine. It will be processed by thread of simulation engine if it is alive and running, else by thread that invokes this method.

Notice in some, very rare cases, message could not be processed. This case is when stop or pause commands are sent right after request message.

Parameters:
request - controller message

receiveMessage

public Message receiveMessage()
Receive message from simulation engine, if any. Received message will be removed from internal AsynchSE queue.

Returns:
message from SE or null, if there are no messages.

isPaused

public boolean isPaused()
Return status of isPaused flag. Generally, if it is true, then simulation is paused, but it is not guaranteed. In some cases simulation process may finishes it's last step before pausing.

Returns:
isPaused flag status

isStopped

public boolean isStopped()
Return status of isStopped flag. Generally, if it is true, then simulation is stopped, but it is not guaranteed. In some cases simulation process may finishes it's last step before stopping.

Returns:
isStopped flag status
